text: Ara yate tini jene nena munaphikaderake. Ara taderake bala hayechila, ‘esa, tomara allah‌ra pathe yud'dha kara athaba pratirodha kara.’ Tara balechila, ‘yadi yud'dha janatama tabe niscitabhabe tomadera anusarana karatama’. Sedina tara imanera ceye kupharira kachakachi chila. Ya tadera antare ne'i tara ta mukhe bale ebam tara ya gopana rakhe allaha ta adhika abagata
